ygData.subject: RE: Something new???
ygData.msgSnippet: This is for the SK darkforge bracer quest armor.  Used to require the shackle from Mino Hero now it requires the broken horn from the Mino Lord to make it
ygData.messageBody:
This is for the SK darkforge bracer quest armor. Used
to require the shackle from Mino Hero now it requires
the broken horn from the Mino Lord to make it easier
for them. It certainly could be used in multiple
quests but that one for sure.

-David
